title: Satay 2.0 - about-us
html:
Satay is the premier yield aggregator on Movement, enabling users to maximize their returns on digital assets. Yield Aggregators have a special place in DeFi, being connected to protocols in each area of DeFi. Satay is a catalyst for the immense value that is created when complementary high performers move as one.

Our structured products provide seamless, broad exposure to a growing — yet fragmented — ecosystem. Our curated vaults help investors maximize returns via strategies with winning DeFi primitives.

Our approach is anchored in several core concepts:

## Secure, curated vault strategies
## Decentralized strategy selection
## Meta-governance to build synergies with partner protocols

Founders: Bennett Davis
